Hi,
 
Can anyone assist me with this Kozuka identification please?
 
The Kozuka shows bamboo in flower coming from a bucket. It appears to be
made of shibuichi and has a nanako-ji surface, the reverse is plain and
unsigned.
 
I'm guessing it's from the 19th Century but can anyone confirm or deny that.
 
http://www.c.farrar.btinternet.co.uk/kozuka.jpg
 
Thanks,
 
Peter
